title.narrative: 1.8 GRP- EMERGENCY AND DRR

description.narrative: 1.8 GRP- Emergency and DDR - Enhanced regional capacity for emergency preparedness, response and resilience, which contributes to Child Health, Child Protection And Emergencies, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Education In Emergencies, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Health And Emergencies, Nutrition And Emergencies, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Sanitation, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition, Wash And Emergencies, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 001 Global and Regional Programme: Enhanced regional capacity related to evidence-based analysis, tools and advocacy and multi- country initiatives contributing to achieve the Strategic Plan targets with equity focus in the LAC region

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 1.8 GRP- Emergency and DDR - Enhanced regional capacity for emergency preparedness, response and resilience

description.narrative: Capacities for emergency preparedness, response and DRR in the LAC region have been increased through continued engagement in cooperation initiatives, effective regional leadership in key humanitarian sectors – particularly during emergencies, and by promoting and advocating for child-focused policies. | Status:Met | As-of Date:19/12/2017

title.narrative: of advocacy and capacity building events at regional level in order to have child focused DRR policies adopted by national governments
of RO preparedness and response activities completed including simulation, inter-cluster meetings, PRP and SOP development
of sectorial working groups' sessions, reports, guiding tools produced and disseminated.
of South-south cooperation initiatives on humanitarian and DRR facilitated by the RO.
